personal.name: GeGarron
personal.headline: AI Full-Stack Engineer | Independent Developer
personal.introduction: Welcome to my digital world. As a full-stack engineer and independent developer committed to pushing the boundaries of AI technology, I perfectly blend my professional front-end development skills with innovative AI applications. My career journey began in front-end engineering, and through continuous learning and practice, I gradually expanded into the full-stack development of AI applications, ultimately embarking on the path of independent entrepreneurship.
personal.title: title
